version_description: Bug fix related to content refresh on the Home screen.
- Minor bug fixes and enhancements
We’ve added iOS 9 support.

- Bug fixes and improvements.
- App icon changed.

- Push notifications updates and improvements.
- Improved design and content on the Watch screen for US users.
- The home screen content grid has been updated to load faster.
- Minor bug fixes and stability improvements.

Our Livestream is now available globally.
A new Today Widget design.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

We’ve redesigned our homescreen, making it cleaner and easier to consume. You can now browse our latest stories, trending stories and trending topics from the homescreen.

We’ve also brought back the live audio stream, allowing you to listen to our

This version fixes a bug which caused push notifications to incorrectly send users to the home screen.

You can now swipe between sections in the homescreen.

We’ve also included iOS 11 support in this release.
This release fixes an issue which would cause the app to crash when trying to open a story from within a section screen.

iPhone X support, bug fixes and performance improvements.

You can now also turn on or off notifications from within the ‘More’ section

Introducing Swipe-able Articles: You can now swipe between the articles in order to quickly view next and previous stories.
We've also made a number of performance improvements to make the app significantly quicker.

We have updated our privacy policy to give you more transparency into the data we collect and how it’s used.

We've completely revamped our articles making them cleaner and easier to consume. You can now also listen to our latest podcast episodes directly inside the app.
